My story

Hi there, thanks for checkingout my portfolio website. Incase you are a bit curious about me, Here's a little bit more about me.

  1. Name: Raymond

  2. Last name: Baguma

  3. Human: True

  4. Starwars fun: True

  5. Fevorite Movie: Puppet Masters

  6. Interested in:Frontend development, UI designs with HTML CSS Javascript jQUery and ReactJS, Data managemnet throughout the entire Data Pipeline including legacy systems such as mainframes [Ingestion, Procession, Storage, Access] API development with nodejs and testing. I'm familiar with data-lakes achitecture and data-warehouses and application usecase in a business enterprise.

  7. Self-taught: True

  8. Projects: Many Including this website

  9. Self-driven: True

  10. Learning culture: My thing

  11. Hobbies: Movies, Driving, Hiking, Gym ...

Strength

  1. Analytical mindset: Recognize, investigate and resolve code anomalies and troubleshooting.

  2. Team player: I work and integrate well in a multi-cultural environment
  3. Resilience: I Intend to succeed against all odds.

  4. Music: I'm proud to be a musician. I play Piano, Bass and Drums. So if you are in my City, you might catch me at a local hungout place rocking the stage.

  5. Life tip: Life has a way of teaching you lessons that matter the most over and over again. live, let live and stay true to your self.

  6. Climate Change: I'm all for a healthy planet and all life on here. Live and let live, be mindful of your environment and imagine you'd live on this rock in the next 200 years.

what I'm all about

Framewoks:
‐ Nodejs, Bootstrap 4, ReactJS and Django

Languagues:
‐ Javascript, Python, HTML5, CSS, Scss, Auth(Google, Github),XML XSLT, X-PATH (x-query), Elastic-search and KIBANA

Database Software:
‐ MongoDB, Firebase auth, and firestore, MySQL, postgreSQL, aws-cloud solutions among others.

Tools:
‐ Github, Git, Heroku, Oxygen XML Editor, POSTMAN, Visual Studio

Achieved skills

services

Alright let's talk business. The cards below represent a concise summery of some of the core technological paradigms or fields I fancy

web development

Web Development specifications on user interractions with a given application. Concentrate on tasks users – both visitors and administrators – need to achieve, going a long way to creating specification that can be benefit both.

Database Management

I'm work confortably with both relational and non-relational databases like MongoDB, mySQL postgreSQL, i have familiarity with firebase cloud data management, and aws-RDS database entreprise database solution(Aurora)

Data VIsualization

Data exploration and or explanations are crusial for decisions that affect business revenue and growth. Tool selection is paramount for data procession, segmentation, market and visualization, as it could mean the difference between the right and or wrong business choices.

API Management

APIs are vital tools for businesses growth. If scalled well, APIs can allow for faster innovation, easier monetization of company products, and better products while standing out from the competition. I understand ho wimportant a concept APIs are and how t interract with them.

aws-cloud achitecture

I'm currently working on my aws-developer associate certificationm, and familier with almost all aws-cloud computing, virtual services, monitoring solutions among others like RDS, EC2, VPC ROUTE-53 EFS, S3 and many more.

Cloud Computing [Azure]

Paas, Saas and Iaas are all core services fundamental to business growth specialization. Though in my opinion, choopsing the correct provider for a company micorservice platform for development, production, mentenance and scalability is the greatest challenge.

timeline

2021

Case Study: Data Engineering (Async Big-Data streaming) from injention, streaming with Apache Kafka pub/sub archtecture, ETL, custom-ETLs && ELT development procedures with Apache-Spark for Business-Intelligence and data-analytics.

4

2020

Case Study: source collaborations with colleagues and mentors, API management, relational and non-relational database-integration and procedures with MongoDB, SQL, firebase, elastic-search/indexing, state management, and overall product life-cicle

3

2019

Case Study: JavaScript, and it's libraries like jQuery, and ReactJS, best practives, and core principles like single-responsibility module-based development, backwards-compatibility, run-time environment [ NodeJs ], front-end tooling and interractivity.

2

2018

Case study: HTML, CSS/SASS, the DOM and its libraries like Bootstrap, best practices, responsive designs, cemantic html and compatibility.

He was continually a great performer, a curious fellow and had a keen eye for detail, not only in is work but also in his questions. I’m happy to recommend Raymond to any position. __2021

I worked with Raymond at Booking.com. While maintaining great working performance, as well as a friendly attitude during stressful situations, he continuously fed his curiosity towards programming and web development. Keeping an eye towards the future, combined with the energy to follow through commitments is only one of the traits that I admire in Raymond. He always takes feedback as an opportunity to become better, which is a great way to learn fast.I was delighted to work with him and am sure he'll do great things in the future.__2021
